title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the RiskAnalysisSimulator tool.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, focusing on components, data flow, integration points, and ensuring scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Consider incorporating modern architectural patterns such as microservices and serverless for enhanced flexibility and scalability.

title: Risk Modeling and Scenario Generation
description: Develop the core logic for modeling risks and generating various scenarios based on the defined parameters.

title: Data Management and Persistence
description: Design and implement the data storage and retrieval mechanisms for risk models, scenarios, and analysis results.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the RiskAnalysisSimulator tool, including input forms, visualization components, and reporting features.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of risk analysis data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the functionality, performance, and reliability of the RiskAnalysisSimulator tool.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring for the RiskAnalysisSimulator tool.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for the RiskAnalysisSimulator tool.
